## IJsonConverterOptions.useNameTemplates property

If true and if template variables are available, then string property names will be rendered using mustache and those variables. Otherwise string properties are copied without modification.

Defaults to true if vars are supplied with options, false otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useNameTemplates: boolean;
```
